thread.title: Chelsea 2 Aston Villa 0 - LIVE

title: Chelsea 2 Aston Villa 0 - LIVE
text: This live stream has now ended. Updates appear in chronological order. 14:39 Walks on Water: We catch up with former player/boss @BrianLittle912 .Check his thoughts here: http://t.co/JeDkOdBToE #AVFC #CFC #CHEAVL — Aston Villa FC (@AVFCOfficial) October 17, 2015 14:39 NOW... AND THEN Congratulations to Gareth Barry.The evergreen @Everton star makes his 550th #BPL start today... pic.twitter.com/xWh50kqf9v — Premier League (@premierleague) October 17, 2015 14:39 FULL-TIME Spurs 0-0 Liverpool. Klopp's 1st #BPL match ends goalless as @SpursOfficial and @LFC cancel each other out pic.twitter.com/l4YmeJa4Ej — Premier League (@premierleague) October 17, 2015 14:41 — Aston Villa FC (@AVFCOfficial) October 17, 2015 14:54 — Aston Villa FC (@AVFCOfficial) October 17, 2015 14:54 — Aston Villa FC (@AVFCOfficial) October 17, 2015 14:54 . @LFC keeper Mignolet on Klopp: “He’s only been here for 3 days but we can already see a few changes” #TOTLIV pic.twitter.com/RhXGz2P2pE — Premier League (@premierleague) October 17, 2015 14:58 — Aston Villa FC (@AVFCOfficial) October 17, 2015 14:58 The teams are out here, with a late change for #afcb as Federici starts in place of Boruc. #MCIBOU — AFC Bournemouth (@afcbournemouth) October 17, 2015 15:09 A fitting tribute to Howard Kendall as fans from both sides take part in a minute's applause for the Everton legend. #mufc — Manchester United (@ManUtd) October 17, 2015 Tap to see all updates in full screen. Close fullscreen
